book.synopsis: Until Vasco da Gama discovered the sea-route to the East in 1497-9 almost nothing was known in the West of the exotic cultures and wealth of the Indian Ocean and its peoples. It is this civilization and its destruction at the hands of the West that Richard Hall recreates in this book. Hall

: ['Richard Hall'], 'title: Empires of the monsoon: A history of the Indian Ocean and its invaders
